articles.title: Sinner rolls to 2nd straight Australian Open title - ESPN
articles.description: Jannik Sinner won the Australian Open for the second consecutive year Sunday, defeating Alexander Zverev 6-3, 7-6 (4), 6-3.
articles.content:
Jan 26, 2025, 06:27 AM ET
MELBOURNE, Australia -- There's all sorts of ways beyond merely the score to measure just how dominant Jannik Sinner was while outplaying and frustrating Alexander Zverev d… [+4830 chars]
